externalDocs.description: Find more information on available services here. Requires authentication.

tags.name: lookup
tags.description: Lookup endpoints for static reference data (countries, licenses, drivers, etc.)

tags.name: member
tags.description: Member profile and related endpoints (profile, awards, participation credits).

tags.name: results
tags.description: Race and session result endpoints (lap data, event logs, season results).

tags.name: season
tags.description: Season-related endpoints (season lists, race guides, schedules).

tags.name: stats
tags.description: Statistical endpoints and summaries for members and seasons.

tags.name: time_attack
tags.description: Time attack specific endpoints and member season results.

parameters.name: cust_id

schema.description: If different from the authenticated member, the following restrictions apply: - Caller cannot be on requested customer's block list or an empty list will result; - Requested customer cannot have their online activity preference set to hidden or an empty list will result; - Only leagues for which the requested customer is an admin and the league roster is not private are returned.

parameters.description: If different from the authenticated member, the following restrictions apply: - Caller cannot be on requested customer's block list or an empty list will result; - Requested customer cannot have their online activity preference set to hidden or an empty list will result; - Only leagues for which the requested customer is an admin and the league roster is not private are returned.
